aboutMe: My name is Siphokuhle Nyana and I am a student at Life Choices .I'm from one of the small townships around Phillipi called Samora Machel .I am a 24 year old young woman that is independent , passionate and hardworking when it comes to things that I love and enjoy doing. In my spare time I like to play around coding , I love to listen to music because I feel like it reasonates with everything I tap into be it entertaining my special space and balancing my social and work life . I am an observant person that takes note of minor detailed specifics such as debugging even the problems that I face in real life . I love playing mind games , problem-solving game ,board game and puzzles . My biggest strength is endurance and resilience .I was raised by my mom alongside with my 3 sisters that are older than me .Encrytion has been my A- game since I got aware that everything in life needs to be taken care of somehow .

projects.name: Age to Days
projects.decription: I used HTML and CSS to generate a website that calculate age  conversion to days .

projects.name: Swegga
projects.decription: In this project I used Javascript and HTML to clone a website that is already working and existing .

projects.decription: Calculate the amount you get from investments over a period of time .

projects.decription: Javascript manipulation ,creating a shopping cart  and exciting features built using Javascript and functionality.

projects.name: Area of a Triangle
projects.decription: User prompts the measurements for the base and the height and click on the button for the application to execute the results. .

projects.name: Avatar Project
projects.decription: This project displays a survey about the people I have interviewed and displays their avatars.

education.description: Academy at Landsdowne Imam Haron Road , I am  doing HTML ,Bootstrap , CSS , Javascript , Vue , MySQL and Node js as my modules . The bonus accompaning this course it that I also do Personal and Proffessional Development Skills , Mental Fitness too as a module.

HC:ICT , I did Information Technology Services Practise  , Business Practise ,ICT Fundamentals,Information Technology Services Theory ,Professional Communications , Programming and Quantitative Techniques
Life Sciences , Geography ,Mathematics ,IsiXhosa HL ,English FAL ,Life Orientation and Physical Sciences

skills.name: Call Centre Outbound
skills.description: Problem solving , calling about arears that are due / overdue .

skills.name: AEDC Facilitation
skills.description: Activists Education Development Centre , an organization based in Cape Town  that aims to equip young people and older to develop their knowledge around being activists and develop skills .

skills.name: Computer Literacy
skills.description: Basics of Microsoft Office , youth leadership .

testimonials.name: Asanda
testimonials.description: During our work together, Siphokuhle has shown a strong commitment to improvement and a positive mindset.Her positive attitude to tackle any task and her willingness to take on challenges have motivated me to improve as well.They always seek new challenges and strive to find solutions, which encourages me to do the same.

testimonials.name: Olwethu
testimonials.description: I had the pleasure of sitting alongside Siphokuhle Nyana in our Class during the programming course at LCA,and I must say, they are an exceptional individual. Their dedication, passion, and work ethic are truly inspiring. Siphokuhle has a unique ability to balance academic rigor with kindness, empathy, and a willingness to help others. Their positive energy is contagious, and they have a way of making everyone feel included and valued.I have had the privilege of being a classmate of Siphokuhle, and I can confidently say that they are one of the most exceptional individuals I have ever met. Their intellectual curiosity, creativity, and passion for learning are truly remarkable.

testimonials.name: Marcus
testimonials.description: Hard worker and has lots of ideas and opinions that contribute to problem solving. Doesn't smile but cares for people who are close.

testimonials.name: Gwiba
testimonials.description: Siphokuhle is a hardworking individual that strives to know and understand her work, so she can prepare the best strategy to solve the problem

testimonials.name: Sihlandlo
testimonials.description: Well, there is a lot that can be said about this soul. Cutting a lot short. Siphokuhle, when it comes to linking up with people for a project or assignment, she sets the atmosphere, and she is a very versatile classmate. Teaming up with her would definitely yield a great output. Negative energy, out of the window

testimonials.name: Yonela
testimonials.description: Siphokuhle is the definition of hard work and dedication and this is proven by what she does as soon as she gets to class very early in the morning, which is opening her laptop and be busy with her work. Her sense of humour creates a healthy and fun environment to work in and what I find most inspiring about her is her ability to lead and come up with creative solutions whenever she is in a group. I wholeheartedly recommend Siphokuhle for any serious or challenging projects because the expected result of her work is excellence and the deadline of the project being met.
